title: MBP 820-00923A A1706 shuts down suddenly
message:
Hello. Rookie question - please tell med if further info is needed. 
I need help with mbp 2017 tb (A1706 - 829-00923-A) The story is as follows; Mbp is handed over because it shuts down in use. Takes after shut down 0.040 amp and 20 volts. If I remove the battery and start it, it boots normally and works for a while. But shuts down again. The fault is periodic and there are no short circuits. I have replaced the CD3215 controllers (thunderbolt ROM U8090…) on both sides, but the same error continues. I have measured most through, but found no errors. I have two logicboards with the same error. Does anyone know of a solution or an idea for where to start searching? CD3215 has not been reballed/changed but this is my next attempt. Battery replaced with a new one - same problem. The mbp was handed over with af exploded battery.
Greetings from Morten


Gre

title: MBP 820-00923A A1706 shuts down suddenly
message:
Did you test with known good battery?
If still shuts down, then no reason to touch USB-C area.

Does it turn off starting in SMC bypass mode?
Try your USB test macOS too.

Clean ME BIOS worth to try also.

title: MBP 820-00923A A1706 shuts down suddenly
message: SOLVED: u7000 replaced and everything is good. Cheers fellows
